author: Tommaso Marcoli
title: Il record negatvio del Tesla Cybertruck, è al sesto richiamo nel 2024
text:
Tesla ha richiamato circa 2.431 Cybertruck prodotti tra il 6 novembre 2023 e il 30 luglio 2024 a causa di un potenziale problema all'inverter che potrebbe causare una perdita di propulsione del veicolo. Questo è il [sesto richiamo per il Cybertruck](https://www.tomshw.it/automotive/il-tesla-cybertruck-e-la-prima-auto-della-storia-con-guida-autonoma-2024-10-01) quest'anno e richiederà la sostituzione fisica dell'hardware, non un semplice aggiornamento software.
Il problema è legato ai transistor ad effetto di campo metallo-ossido-semiconduttore (MOSFET) nell'inverter, che potrebbero smettere di generare coppia motrice improvvisamente. In caso di guasto, un avviso visivo apparirà sul display centrale invitando il conducente ad accostare. Tesla ha dichiarato di essere a conoscenza di cinque richieste di garanzia legate a questo problema, ma non sono stati segnalati incidenti o feriti.
Nonostante il suo successo di vendite iniziale, il Cybertruck ha affrontato diverse sfide tecniche sin dal suo lancio. I precedenti richiami hanno riguardato problemi come la visualizzazione ritardata della telecamera posteriore, [tergicristalli difettosi](https://www.tomshw.it/No Widgetbay parameter id or link defined), finiture allentate, pedale dell'acceleratore bloccato e caratteri troppo piccoli sulle spie di avvertimento. Tesla inizierà a sostituire gli inverter difettosi con versioni funzionanti dopo il 9 dicembre. Nel frattempo, l'azienda sta inviando comunicazioni ai proprietari dei veicoli interessati.
Oltre ai problemi specifici del Cybertruck, Tesla è attualmente oggetto di diverse indagini, principalmente incentrate sulle sue tecnologie di assistenza alla guida Autopilot e Full Self-Driving. L'indagine più recente riguarda incidenti di veicoli Tesla che utilizzano FSD in condizioni di scarsa visibilità.

author: @jagrannews
title: Indian Navy Recruitment 2025: इंडियन नेवी में सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन के पदों पर निकली भर्ती, 60 हजार से अधिक मिलेगी सैलरी
text:
Indian Navy Recruitment 2025: इंडियन नेवी में सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन के पदों पर निकली भर्ती, 60 हजार से अधिक मिलेगी सैलरी
इंडियन नेवी की ओर से सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन (ग्रुप-सी) के 1200 से अधिक पदों पर भर्ती के लिए आवेदन जल्द ही शुरू होने वाले है। इच्छुक एवं योग्य उम्मीदवार इन पदों के लिए जल्द ही आवेदन कर सकेंगे। आवेदन करने के लिए उम्मीदवारों की न्यूनतम आयु 21 वर्ष होनी चाहिए व उम्मीदवारों के पास दसवीं का प्रमाण-पत्र होना चाहिए।
जॉब डेस्क, नई दिल्ली: इंडियन नेवी की ओर से सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन (ग्रुप-सी) के पदों पर भर्ती के लिए ऑफिशियल नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया गया है। इंडियन नेवी की ओर से सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन के कुल 1266 पदों पर भर्ती की जाएगी। अगर आप भी इंडियन नेवी में सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन के पदों पर नौकरी करना चाहते हैं, तो यह आपके लिए एक सुनहरा मौका है। यह भर्ती रोजगार समाचार में 9 से 15 के साप्ताहिक समाचार-पत्र में प्रकाशित किया गया है। रोजगार समाचार-पत्र में प्रकाशित विज्ञापन के तहत आवेदन पांचवे दिन से शुरू हो जाएंगे। साथ ही इन पदों पर आवेदन करने के लिए आवेदन शुरू होने से 21 दिन तक स्वीकार किए जाएंगे।
शैक्षणिक योग्यता
इन पदों पर आवेदन करने के लिए जरूरी है कि उम्मीदवार ने भारत के किसी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड या संस्थान से कक्षा दसवीं के साथ ट्रेड में अप्रेंटिसशिप ट्रेनिंग को पूरा किया हो। साथ ही उम्मीदवारों के पास अन्य निर्धारित पात्रताएं भी होनी चाहिए।
कितना मिलेगा वेतन
इस पद पर चयनित उम्मीदवारों को प्रतिमाह 19,900 रुपये से लेकर रुपये 63,200 प्रतिमाह प्रदान किए जाएंगे।
आयु-सीमा
सिविलियन ट्रेड्समैन (ग्रुप-सी) के पद पर आवेदन करने के लिए उम्मीदवारों की न्यूनतम आयु 18 वर्ष व अधिकतम आयु 25 वर्ष निर्धारित की गई है। इसके अलावा, विशेष वर्ग के उम्मीदवारों को आयु-सीमा में छूट भी प्रदान की जाएगी। एससी व एसटी उम्मीदवारों को आयु-सीमा में 5 वर्ष की छूट, ओबीसी उम्मीदवारों को आयु-सीमा में 3 वर्ष की छूट और दिव्यांग उम्मीदवारों को आयु-सीमा में 10 वर्ष की छूट प्रदान की जाएगी।
परीक्षा पैटर्न
उम्मीदवारों का चयन लिखित परीक्षा के आधार पर किया जाएगा। लिखित परीक्षा में उम्मीदवारों से जनरल इंटेलिजेंस और रीजनिंग, सामान्य जागरूकता, क्वांटेटिव एप्टीट्यूड और अंग्रेजी विषय से 100 अंकों के प्रश्न पूछे जाएंगे। परीक्षा की अवधि दो घंटे निर्धारित की गई है।

author: Malcolm Shields
title: Palm Beach Gardens closes some outdoor facilities because of inclement weather
text:

IT IS GOING TO BE RAINY, AT LEAST FOR THE NEXT COUPLE OF HOURS. ACROSS THE STATE OF FLORIDA, I AM TRACKING LIGHT TO MODERATE SHOWERS STILL IMPACTING INDIAN RIVER COUNTY OUT TOWARDS FORT DRUM FOR BASINGER AND OKEECHOBEE, ALL THIS LIGHT RAIN WILL BE HEADING TOWARDS FORT PIERCE, PORT SAINT LUCIE, VERY SHORTLY AND EVEN DOWN INTO PALM CITY AS WELL. MORE RIGHT BEHIND THAT. SO IT IS GOING TO BE RAINING, AT LEAST FOR THE NEXT 1 OR 2 HOURS OUT THERE, DOWN INTO MARTIN COUNTY AND THE PALM BEACHES LIGHT TOMORROW. SHOWERS IMPACTING JUPITER FARMS DOWN INTO THE TURNPIKE AREA. WELLINGTON DELRAY BEACH, BOYNTON BEACH SEEING SOME LIGHT SHOWERS AND EVEN OUT TOWARDS BELLE GLADE AND PAHOKEE. STILL RAINING AND WE ARE GOING TO SEE MORE RAIN RIGHT BEHIND THAT. SO BY 9:00 10:00 IN THE MORNING WE MAY SEE SOME LIGHT TO MODERATE SHOWERS, LOTS OF CLOUD COVERAGE OUT THERE, SO JUST EXPECT MOSTLY CLOUDY CONDITIONS ALL DAY ON YOUR FRIDAY PART OF YOUR SATURDAY AS WELL. A FEW POCKETS OF HEAVY RAINS IMPACTING OUR AREA. WE COULD GET A BREAK OF THE RAIN AFTER 12:00 IN THE AFTERNOON, ACCORDING TO THIS MODEL, AND OTHER MODELS ARE AGREEING WITH IT AS WELL. AND THEN WE’LL SEE ANOTHER ROUND FOR SOME RAINS. STEADY RAINS, A FEW POCKETS OF HEAVY RAINS THAT MAY LEAD TO STREET FLOODING AS WELL. HEAVY RAINS BY FIVE 6:00 IN THE EVENING AND THEN IT WILL CONTINUE TO RAIN OVERNIGHT WHILE WE’RE SLEEPING. AND THEN WHEN YOU WAKE UP AT FIVE, SIX, 6:00 IN THE MORNING, STILL RAINING OUT THERE AND A FEW POCKETS OF LIGHT TOMORROW, SHOWERS AROUND TEN 11:00 IN THE MORNING. JUST A VERY SOGGY START ON YOUR SATURDAY AND THEN THE FRONT WILL BE CLEARING US OUT COMPLETELY SATURDAY AFTERNOON. BY ONE 2:00 IN THE AFTERNOON, WE’LL FINALLY SEE SOME SUNSHINE TRYING TO PEEK THROUGH ACROSS THE TREASURE COAST. SOME LINGERING SHOWERS OUT THERE IN STUART AND EVEN DOWN INTO BROWARD COUNTY. THEN ON SATURDAY EVENING, JUST A FEW LIGHT SHOWERS AND WE’LL SEE MORE CLOUDS BUILDING IN THEN CLEAR SKIES. EVENTUALLY OVERNIGHT ON SATURDAY. SO STORM IMPACTS FOR TODAY AND PART OF YOUR SATURDAY WILL BE HEAVY RAINS AND STEADY RAINS OUT THERE. GUSTY WINDS UP TO 30MPH. THE POTENTIAL FOR SOME LIGHTNING STRIKES AND LOCALIZED FLOODING. NOT EVERYONE WILL SEE SOME POUNDING ON THE ROADWAYS. WINDS RIGHT NOW UP TO 22MPH. VERY GUSTY DOWN INTO BOCA AND BOYNTON BEACH. CLOSE TO 25. WE ARE GOING TO SEE THAT WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT STARTING AT 12:00 UNTIL TOMORROW NIGHT. THAT MEANS WINDS OVER 30MPH IN OUR COASTAL AREAS. TEMPERATURES NOW IN THE 60S AND THE LOWER 70S. IT WILL STAY THAT WAY PRETTY MUCH ALL DAY LONG. TEMPERATURES NO LOW TO MID 70S AND IMPACT WEATHER ALL DAY. SO MAKE SURE YOU PACK THAT UMBRELLA ON YOUR FRIDAY AND PART OF YOUR SATURDAY. YOUR SEVEN DAY FORECAST. WE’LL SEE DRIER CONDITIONS SATURDAY AFTERNOON AND YOUR SUNDAY LOOKS PERFECT WITH A LOT OF SUNSHINE. A LITTLE BIT COOLER. TEMPERATURES WILL BE IN THE 50S. IN THE LOWER 60S WHEN YOU WAKE UP SUNDAY MORNING, AND THEN MILDER ON MONDAY AND TUESDAY. Updated: 12:07 PM EDT Mar 22, 2024 Malcolm Shields Digital Content Producer Because of inclement weather, facilities and events across the Palm Beaches and the Treasure Coast on Friday are closed, canceled or postponed. The village of Palm Springs announced Friday its Easter Egg Hunt scheduled for this weekend was rescheduled to 10 a.m. Saturday, March 30.The St. Lucie County government announced Friday the Mobile Rec and Roll event at Lawnwood Skate Park in Fort Pierce was canceled.The Boynton Beach Police Department's Kids versus Field Day scheduled for Friday was postponed and is expected to be held on a to be determined date this summer.The city of Jupiter's "Touch a Truck Spring Fling" even was canceled.The city of Palm Beach Gardens' open swim on Friday was canceled, while the courts at the tennis and pickleball center are also closed. PALM BEACH GARDENS, Fla. — Because of inclement weather, facilities and events across the Palm Beaches and the Treasure Coast on Friday are closed, canceled or postponed.
Potential for heavy rain, localized flooding and gusty winds Friday Advertisement The village of Palm Springs announced Friday its Easter Egg Hunt scheduled for this weekend was rescheduled to 10 a.m. Saturday, March 30.
The St. Lucie County government announced Friday the Mobile Rec and Roll event at Lawnwood Skate Park in Fort Pierce was canceled.
The Boynton Beach Police Department's Kids versus Field Day scheduled for Friday was postponed and is expected to be held on a to be determined date this summer.
The city of Jupiter's "Touch a Truck Spring Fling" even was canceled.
The city of Palm Beach Gardens' open swim on Friday was canceled, while the courts at the tennis and pickleball center are also closed.

author: @MetroEcuador
title: Galápagos: una ave que se creía extinta hace casi dos siglos reaparece
text:
Un grupo de científicos ha logrado redescubrir una especie de ave terrestre endémica que se pensaba extinta desde hace casi dos siglos. Se trata de [El pachay de Galápagos (Laterallus spilonota) que fue encontrado en la isla Floreana, en las Islas Galápagos. ]
PUBLICIDAD
Este importante hallazgo fue anunciado el jueves 27 de febrero de 2025 por la Fundación Charles Darwin (FCD).
El Pachay de Galápagos: Un Redescubrimiento Científico en Floreana
El pachay de Galápagos se había registrado por última vez en Floreana durante la visita de Charles Darwin en 1835, marcando este redescubrimiento como el primer registro oficial de la especie en esta isla.
Aunque más reciente en otras islas del archipiélago, este nuevo avistamiento subraya el valor de la conservación en esta zona.
La FCD considera este hallazgo un avance significativo para el proyecto de Restauración de Floreana, que tiene como objetivo reintroducir a las 12 especies extintas localmente, entre ellas el pachay de Galápagos.
Características del Pachay de Galápagos: Una Especie Vulnerable
El pachay de Galápagos es un ave pequeña que pesa entre 35 y 45 gramos. Su plumaje oscuro, con motas blancas y ojos rojos, lo hace fácilmente identificable.
Es una especie clasificada como vulnerable por la Unión Internacional para la Conservación de la Naturaleza (IUCN), y actualmente habita en diversas islas del archipiélago como Fernandina, Isabela, y Santiago. Debido a su naturaleza esquiva, suele esconderse en vegetación densa y pastizales altos.
PUBLICIDAD
El Redescubrimiento del Pachay de Galápagos: Un Hallazgo Clave para la Restauración Ecológica
Durante la última expedición de monitoreo de aves terrestres en la isla Floreana, investigadores de la FCD y guardaparques del Parque Nacional Galápagos registraron la presencia de pachay de Galápagos en tres sitios distintos dentro de la zona de transición de la isla.
Con seis registros acústicos, dos avistamientos visuales y una fotografía, los científicos confirmaron la presencia de la especie, lo que representa un éxito significativo en los esfuerzos de monitoreo de aves en la isla.
Una Búsqueda que Dura Más de 190 Años
Desde 2015, la FCD ha monitoreado anualmente todos los sitios relevantes para esta especie.
El hecho de que esta sea la primera vez en 190 años que se registra la especie en Floreana refuerza la importancia de este redescubrimiento.
Birgit Fessl, investigadora principal del programa de conservación, sugiere que el pachay de Galápagos pudo haber recolonizado la isla, o bien, nunca estuvo realmente extinto, sino que su población extremadamente baja hizo que fuera difícil de detectar.

author: Redacción Los Andes
title: No hay vuelta atrás: el Tribunal de Disciplina ratificó el descenso de Colón de Santa Fe
text: El Tribunal de Disciplina de la AFA rechazó la petición de Colón de Santa Fe, que solicitó la eliminación de la pérdida de categoría por tabla anual, y ratificó su descenso a Primera Nacional. La entidad que rige al fútbol argentino emitirá este viernes esa resolución en el Boletín Oficial. Ante esta decisión, el conjunto santafesino, al igual que Arsenal, son los dos descendidos y jugarán en la segunda categoría del fútbol argentino en 2024. El pasado 6 de diciembre, luego de perder por 1 a 0 ante Gimnasia La Plata, Colón realizó una presentación, por intermedio de su abogado, pidiendo la anulación del descenso. “A mediados de 2023 se decidió por Asamblea de AFA la modificación del art.90 del Estatuto y por ende de los descensos de categoría, eliminando uno de los descensos. Esto se produjo con la temporada ya en curso. (...). Este nuevo sistema adoptado una vez que la temporada ya estaba en curso es abiertamente ilegítimo y violatorio de las garantías de igualdad jurídica y deportiva”, comenzaba el escrito. “Un partido desempate disputado sobre la base de un reglamento alterado en medio de la competencia sin la aprobación de todos los miembros del Comité Ejecutivo no puede admitirse. Las modificaciones de la Asamblea de junio 2023 sin la aprobación de la totalidad de los miembros del Comité, debieron en todo caso regir para la temporada 2024″, completó la entidad sabalera encabezada en ese entonces por José Vignatti. Tras dos semanas de espera, el cuerpo disciplinario decidió ratificar la pérdida de categoría y lo dará a conocer en las próximas horas. Uno de los cambios que la AFA planea para 2024 es el de reacomodar las competencias de la reserva, que podría desaparecer y en su lugar regionalizarla para reemplazarla por selectivos que jueguen cuadrangulares con otros equipos de cercanía. Así se evitarían altos costos de los traslados de las delegaciones.

author: Redacción Primicias
title: El correísmo obtuvo el 96% de los votos en las cárceles ecuatorianas en la segunda vuelta
text:
El correísmo obtuvo el 96% de los votos en las cárceles ecuatorianas en la segunda vuelta
El 13 de abril de 2025, 1.143 presos votaron para Presidente de la República en Ecuador en la segunda vuelta. El 96,19% de los sufragios fue a favor de Luisa González, candidata de la Revolución Ciudadana.
Un preso vota en la segunda vuelta de las elecciones presidenciales de 2025, el 10 de abril, en Archidona.
- Foto
Cortesía / SNAI
Autor:
Actualizada:
Compartir:
Al igual que en la primera vuelta, Luisa González, candidata presidencial por la Revolución Ciudadana, tuvo una victoria contundente en la votación carcelaria en el balotaje, frente al presidente reelecto Daniel Noboa.
Hasta finales de marzo de 2025, según datos del Servicio de Atención a Personas Privadas de la Libertad (SNAI), en las 35 cárceles del país había 34.380 presos. De ese número, solo 4.274 estuvieron habilitados para sufragar el 10 de abril de 2025. Es decir, un 12,43%.
De los habilitados, solo 1.143 se presentaron a votar en las juntas que se instalaron en los centros de detención. En definitiva, solo el 3,32% de los detenidos en prisiones ecuatorianas votaron para elegir Presidente de la República.
Según la normativa ecuatoriana, los presos que no han sido sentenciados, es decir, quienes cumplen prisión preventiva, pueden votar en las elecciones. Para la primera vuelta hubo 6.140 personas habilitadas para votar y para el balotaje el padrón penitenciario se redujo en un 30%.
PRIMICIAS revisó los resultados de las juntas receptoras del voto de todas las prisiones. De los 1.143 votantes, seis dejaron la papeleta en blanco y otros 36 anularon su sufragio. Lo que significa que hubo únicamente 1.101 votos válidos, 17% menos que en la primera vuelta.
Dentro de los votos válidos, el 96,19% (1.059 votos) fueron a favor de Luisa González, candidata de la Revolución Ciudadana (RC). El presidente reelecto Daniel Noboa, en cambio, obtuvo 42 sufragios, lo que significó un 3,81% de la votación carcelaria.
Los votos en cada prisión
Al revisar la votación de los presos ecuatorianos, cárcel por cárcel, se evidencia que González ganó en 29 de las 35 prisiones. En las cárceles de Alausí (Chimborazo), El Rodeo (Portoviejo), Machala (El Oro), La Roca (Guayas) y Chillogallo (Pichincha) ninguno de los votantes habilitados se presentó. Hubo un 100% de ausentismo en los cinco centros.
Mientras que en la cárcel de Ambato, en Tungurahua, dos presos votaron por cada uno de los candidatos, por lo que hubo un empate.
En cuanto a la votación de Luisa González, la mayor cantidad de apoyos fue en la Penitenciaría del Litoral, en Guayaquil. 326 presos votaron por ella en esa prisión. Mientras que el mejor resultado para Noboa fue en la Cárcel de Loja, con 14 votos.
A continuación, puede revisar los datos de votación de cada prisión del país, por provincia o por candidato:
Compartir:

author: Ashleigh Madden
title: Unusual wind direction to elevate wind power | Weatherzone Business
text: After a lull in the winds this week, wind power is set to pick up from rock bottom as a rare easterly wind surge impacts Qld, NSW and SA. Wind power has been slack this week across the National Electricity Market (NEM) in response to a stubborn high-pressure system which has parked itself over the Bight. Image: Mean Sea Level Pressure (MSLP) at 10am on Friday, July 5 This high will continue to sit over the Bight and Tas, until it finally moves east into the Tasman Sea on Monday, July 8. The image below shows that we saw low wind power in the order of 30 to 60 GWh/day in response to this high earlier this week, but wind has picked up slightly to 100 GWh/day on Thursday, July 4. Image: Wind contribution to generation (GW) during the last 30 days leading up to Thursday, July 4. Source: OpenNEM Usually with high pressure sitting over the Bight, wind power should continue to be low into next week. However, the images below show a rare easterly wind surge elevating winds slightly across parts of Qld, NSW and SA from Friday and possibly Vic on Monday. Images: Instantaneous wind gust forecast between Friday, July 5 and Thursday, July 11 While it is common for easterly winds to move over Australia, it is the strength of the wind that is unusual. The strongest winds over southern Australia, typically originate from the north or south, while for the east coast, westerly winds are typically the strongest. These winds are normally associated with cold fronts sweeping over the country. This weekend we will see easterly winds strengthen as they feed into a cut of low over SA cradled by a high-pressure system in the Bight. The easterly wind surge will not match the strength of winds associated with cold fronts, so wind power will remain low to medium across Qld, NSW and SA. The image below shows that the wind farm output across the NEM should increase ever so slightly in the coming days, compared to the very low winds we saw earlier this week. Image: Weatherzone’s Opticast Wind Farm Output for the NEM from Friday, July 5 to Friday, July 12. The stronger easterly winds in these states, will also be accompanied by a thick northeasterly cloudband stretching from the Coral Sea down to SA. You can see in the image below that it has already begun thickening up and producing rainfall in these areas. Image: Himawari-9 satellite image at 11:50am AEST on Friday, July 5 This cloudband is likely to reduce solar output in these states between Friday and early next week. So, when is decent wind power coming? You can see in the image above wind power is forecast to increase above 150 MWh day later next week in the NEM, with strong cold front finally able to make its way across southern Australia. Utilising Opticast’s data, we provide wind power generation, operational and severe weather forecasting to improve your planning and protect your valuable staff and assets. Utilise generation forecasts for individual wind farms, state level and the NEM at daily and hourly resolution. Weatherzone’ Total Lightning Network ensures your wind farm is protected from severe storms by an alerting system that can be configured to your exact requirements, aligning with local site needs, procedures and legislation. author: CJ Keeney
title: Does the Nevada GOP support dismantling the Department of Education? - The Nevada Independent
text: Does the Nevada GOP support dismantling the Department of Education? YES In its 2024 party platform, the Nevada Republican Party calls for breaking up the federal Department of Education. “We support the elimination of the unconstitutional US Department of Education,” the platform reads, asserting that “education is a state and local responsibility.” Congress created the Department of Education in 1979 as an agency to establish education policies, implement laws and oversee, coordinate and distribute federal financial aid. Republican calls to dismantle the agency have been made since it was founded. This Fact Brief is responsive to conversations such as this one . Sources Nevada GOP Nevada Republican Party 2024 platform US Department of Education An Overview of the U.S. Department of Education-- Pg 1 The Guardian Trump and Project 2025 are attacking the Department of Education. How might they reshape US schools? The Nevada Independent is a proud participant in The Gigafact Project — an initiative to safeguard democracy and spread accurate information. Have you seen a claim online that you want fact-checked? Send us a link here . [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#75161a07071016011c1a1b0635011d101b031c1b110c5b161a18).

author: @rtlinfo
title: Un ex-informaticien de la CIA condamné à 40 ans de prison pour fuite massive sur WikiLeaks | RTL Info
text: Partager: Un ancien informaticien de la CIA a été condamné jeudi à 40 ans de prison pour avoir transmis en 2017 au site WikiLeaks des outils de cyberespionnage, "la plus grave fuite de données" de l'histoire de l'agence américaine de renseignement, selon l'accusation. Joshua Schulte, 35 ans, a été reconnu coupable en juillet 2022 de huit chefs d'accusation d'espionnage. Il a également été reconnu coupable en septembre 2023 de détention de pédopornographie, une importante collection de vidéos pédopornographiques ayant été découverte dans ses ordinateurs pendant une perquisition à son domicile. "Joshua Schulte a trahi son pays en commettant l'un des actes d'espionnage les plus éhontés de l'histoire américaine", a commenté jeudi le procureur fédéral de New York Damian Williams dans un communiqué. "M. Schulte a gravement nui à la sécurité nationale des Etats-Unis et directement mis en danger les vies d'employés de la CIA, persistant dans son attitude même après son arrestation" en 2017, a affirmé le vice-ministre de la Justice chargé de la division Sécurité nationale, Matthew Olsen, cité dans le texte. En 2016, alors qu'il travaillait pour une unité d'élite spécialisée dans le cyberespionnage, il avait commencé à rassembler la collection "Vault 7", des outils de piratage, des logiciels malveillants et des virus informatiques. WikiLeaks avait commencé à publier les 8.761 documents en mars 2017, embarrassant grandement l'agence et fournissant aux pirates professionnels et amateurs du monde entier les mêmes outils que les agents du renseignement américain. "La source souhaite lancer un débat public sur la sécurité, la création, l'utilisation, la prolifération et le contrôle démocratique des cyberarmes", avait à l'époque déclaré WikiLeaks. Mais l'accusation affirme que la motivation de Joshua Schulte était de se venger de la CIA, dont il reprochait à la direction de ne pas avoir pris son parti dans des conflits internes.

author: Mazhar Abbas
title: Gov. Jim Justice Awards $15.7M for New Mullens School, Unites Community and History
text:
Amidst the echoes of a rich basketball legacy and excited cheers, Gov. Jim Justice and First Lady Cathy Justice, accompanied by their recovering dog, Babydog, presented a significant $15,711,654 check from the West Virginia School Building Authority at Mullens Middle School. This grant, earmarked for the construction of a new Mullens Elementary and Middle School, symbolizes a substantial investment in the future of education in Wyoming County. Set to consolidate two historic schools, this development promises a state-of-the-art learning environment for pre-kindergarten through eighth-grade students by fall 2026.
Historic Consolidation and Community Impact
The grant represents a pivotal moment for Mullens, combining $8,753,193 from a $20.1 million facilities bond sale with state funds to create a new educational landmark. The new Mullens Elementary and Middle School, costing a total of $24,464,847, will replace buildings dating back to 1951 and 1923, respectively. Located on the site of the Mullens athletic field, the project not only preserves but revitalizes a piece of the community's heart, embedding educational progress within a cherished historical context.
Commemorating a Rich Legacy
Gov. Justice, reminiscing about his own experiences in Mullens' gym and the formidable legacy of local basketball heroes like the D'Antoni brothers and Jerome Anderson, emphasized the importance of remembering and building upon the community's achievements. The school's gym, adorned with banners of seven state basketball championships, stands as a testament to the town's enduring spirit and excellence. This project, therefore, is seen not just as the construction of a building, but as a continuation of Mullens' proud tradition of achievement and community strength.
Looking Toward the Future
The anticipation for the new school is palpable among students, educators, and community members. With groundbreaking ceremonies tentatively scheduled for April 12, the project promises not only a modern educational facility but also a source of community pride and rejuvenation. Superintendent Deirdre Cline and incoming superintendent John Henry expressed their commitment to creating a school where students can build great memories, emphasizing the importance of pride in one's roots and the boundless potential of the students of Mullens.
As the community looks forward to the opening of the new school in the fall of 2026, the project stands as a beacon of hope and progress. It represents not only a significant investment in the educational future of Wyoming County's children but also a profound commitment to preserving and celebrating the rich history and enduring spirit of the Mullens community.
